summary: LOW BEAM HEADLIGHTS ARE SO POOR I FEEL I CANNOT SAFELY SEE TO DRIVE.  HAVE CHECKED ALIGNMENT AND THEY ARE JUST VERY POORLY DESIGNED ACCORDING TO DEALER.  CANNOT SEE ADEQUATE DISTANCE TO STOP SAFELY ON LOW BEAMS AT REASONABLE SPEEDS.  SO BAD I SELDOM EVER DRIVE AT NIGHT AND NEVER ON THE HIGHWAY.
